price: ដែលនៅក្នុងវា(ស្រា)មិនធ្វើឱ្យប៉ះពាល់ដល់សុខភាព ឡើយ ហើយក៏មិនឱ្យពួកគេស្រវឹងដោយសារវាដែរ។
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
